title: Morristown National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Why should you get involved with Morristown National Historical Park? Because you can:  take an active role in preserving national treasures like the Ford Mansion and the Jockey Hollow Encampment Area welcome visitors from all over the country and the world to the unique and special resources found at Morristown share your love of American history with the public help maintain over 27 miles of hiking trails for hundreds of thousands of visitors who enjoy them every year volunteer your talents in everything from photography to gardening expand your social network by meeting park rangers, other volunteers, and members of our various partner groups have fun while doing something worthwhile
